item.description:
Discussion and planning to help Ron Paul.

Please join us this coming Monday at 7pm at Bob French's apartment, Unit 5-1, 210 South St. in downtown Boston (a short walk from South Station).

The campaign is growing and deadlines approaching quickly. With lots of ideas kicking around from many members we can spend a couple of hours sharing information and planning for the critical couple of months ahead.

Some tentative items on the agenda (not exhaustive, please contribute your ideas):

1. Canvassing in NH (report?)
2. Boston area phone bank
3. Dec. 16 Tea Party event (possible rally with Ron Paul?).
4. Support get-out-the-vote for the NH primary (Automated Phoning chip-in, etc)
5. Other plans/ideas

Bob's telephone # : 617 642-9357 and
here's a map:
http://www.mapquest.c...
item.name: RP Campaign Planning Meeting-Boston
